text: "You're No Good" is a song done originally by Dee Dee Warwick in 1963 The song was made more popular by Linda Ronstadt in 1974. It was taken from her fifth studio album Heart Like a Wheel. Ronstadt's version went to number 1 in the United States, number 7 in Canada, number 15 in Australia, number 17 in the Netherlands and number 24 in New Zealand. Category:1963 songs Category:Linda Ronstadt songs
title: You're No Good
